sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_Diag_867
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: RetriggerNMDiagActiveTimer ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/UDS_Services_Chorus/DiagnosticTimers/c/inc/DiagnosticTimers.h line 275 Requirement is satisfied here: if ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/UDS_Services_Chorus/DiagnosticTimers/c/src/DiagnosticTimers.c line 1056
Requirement is not verified IF Chorus moves back from a NonDefaultSession to the DefaultSession due to the transition 35 THEN T_NM_DiagActive = 40 s ELSE T_NM_DiagActive = 4 s AND Chorus shall start the timer ID: SWR_ICAS1_Diag_867 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_Diag_866
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: DiagnosticTimersSetDefaultSessionState ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/UDS_Services_Chorus/DiagnosticTimers/c/inc/DiagnosticTimers.h line 198 Requirement is satisfied here: setNMDiagActive ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/UDS_Services_Chorus/DiagnosticTimers/c/src/DiagnosticTimers.c line 1120
Requirement is not verified IF Chorus detects transiton to a NonDefaultSession THEN T_NM_DiagActive shall be stopped ID: SWR_ICAS1_Diag_866 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_Diag_864
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: DiagnosticTimersNotifyDiagnoseActiveStatus ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/UDS_Services_Chorus/DiagnosticTimers/c/inc/DiagnosticTimers.h line 351 Requirement is satisfied here: if ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/UDS_Services_Chorus/DiagnosticTimers/c/src/DiagnosticTimers.c line 1080
Requirement is not verified IF Chorus is in the DefaultSession, AND there is a diagnostic request or response THEN Chours shall start or re-trigger T_NM_DiagActive timer ID: SWR_ICAS1_Diag_864 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_Diag_863
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: RetriggerNMDiagActiveTimerOnDiagnosticRequest ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/UDS_Services_Chorus/DiagnosticTimers/c/src/DiagnosticTimers.c line 473 Requirement is satisfied here: if ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/UDS_Services_Chorus/DiagnosticTimers/c/src/DiagnosticTimers.c line 1081
Requirement is not verified IF Chours is in the DefaultSession, AND functionally addressed TesterPresent with SuppressPositiveResponseBit == 1 OR requests with SID 01hex - 0Fhex (OBDServices) to be ignored THEN Chours shall not start or re-trigger T_NM_DiagActive timer ID: SWR_ICAS1_Diag_863 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_Diag_857
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: DiagnosticTimersCyclic ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/UDS_Services_Chorus/DiagnosticTimers/c/inc/DiagnosticTimers.h line 391 Requirement is satisfied here: if ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/UDS_Services_Chorus/DiagnosticTimers/c/src/DiagnosticTimers.c line 1092
Requirement is not verified IF Chorus is in the DeafaultSession AND T_NM_DiagActive is running THEN s_NM_DiagActive = 1
Remark: s_NM_DiagActive is a signal exposed to the RTE ID: SWR_ICAS1_Diag_857 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_Diag_856
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: setNMDiagActive ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/UDS_Services_Chorus/DiagnosticTimers/c/src/DiagnosticTimers.c line 427 Requirement is satisfied here: if ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/UDS_Services_Chorus/DiagnosticTimers/c/src/DiagnosticTimers.c line 1093
Requirement is not verified IF Chorus is in a NonDefaultSession THEN s_NM_DiagActive = 1
Remark: s_NM_DiagActive is a signal exposed to the RTE ID: SWR_ICAS1_Diag_856 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_Diag_859
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: if ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/UDS_Services_Chorus/DiagnosticTimers/c/src/DiagnosticTimers.c line 1094
Requirement is not verified IF Chours is in the DeafaulSession AND T_NM_DiagActive timer expired THEN s_NM_DiagActive = 0
Remark: s_NM_DiagActive is a signal exposed to the RTE ID: SWR_ICAS1_Diag_859 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_Diag_875
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: RetriggerTDiagEnableTimer ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/UDS_Services_Chorus/DiagnosticTimers/c/inc/DiagnosticTimers.h line 235 Requirement is satisfied here: processDrivingCycleTimer ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/UDS_Services_Chorus/DiagnosticTimers/c/src/DiagnosticTimers.c line 607 Requirement is satisfied here: if ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/UDS_Services_Chorus/DiagnosticTimers/c/src/DiagnosticTimers.c line 1095
Requirement is not verified IF Chorus detects transition from KL15_ON to KL15_OFF THEN T_Diag_Enable = 900 s (15 min)
ELSE IF Chorus wakes up AND KL15_OFF THEN T_Diag_Enable = 60 s AND Chorus shall start the timer
ID: SWR_ICAS1_Diag_875 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_Diag_873
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: ProcessTDiagEnable ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/UDS_Services_Chorus/DiagnosticTimers/c/src/DiagnosticTimers.c line 518 Requirement is satisfied here: ProcessNMDiagAcive ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/UDS_Services_Chorus/DiagnosticTimers/c/src/DiagnosticTimers.c line 563 Requirement is satisfied here: if ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/UDS_Services_Chorus/DiagnosticTimers/c/src/DiagnosticTimers.c line 1096
Requirement is not verified IF Chorus detects the transition from the DefaultSession to a NonDefaultSession THEN The T_Diag_Enable timer shall be stopped ID: SWR_ICAS1_Diag_873 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_Diag_876
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: DiagnosticTimersNotifyTransition35 ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/UDS_Services_Chorus/DiagnosticTimers/c/inc/DiagnosticTimers.h line 312 Requirement is satisfied here: if ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/UDS_Services_Chorus/DiagnosticTimers/c/src/DiagnosticTimers.c line 1055 Requirement is satisfied here: if ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/UDS_Services_Chorus/DiagnosticTimers/c/src/DiagnosticTimers.c line 1097
Requirement is not verified IF T_Diag_Enable timer has elapsed AND all requests have been processed THEN Chorus shall not re-trigger T_NM_DiagActive timer
ID: SWR_ICAS1_Diag_876 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

simplesect.para: Requirement is not verified IF T_Diag_Enable timer has elapsed, AND there is still request in processing THEN this request shall be completed ID: SWR_ICAS1_Diag_877 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_Diag_917
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: update_SI_DiagnoseActive_SignalForSPN ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/UDS_Services_Chorus/DiagnosticTimers/c/src/DiagnosticTimers.c line 825
Requirement is not verified After start up or wake up, as long as the ICAS1 hasn't received a single Diagnostic request, it shall, in every Systeminfo PDU it sends out, set the signal Systeminfo_01.SI_Diagnose_Aktiv = 0 .
ID: SWR_ICAS1_Diag_917 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_Diag_911
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: RetriggerSI_DiagnoseAktivTimer ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/UDS_Services_Chorus/DiagnosticTimers/c/inc/DiagnosticTimers.h line 429 Requirement is satisfied here: ProcessSI_DiagnoseActive ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/UDS_Services_Chorus/DiagnosticTimers/c/src/DiagnosticTimers.c line 694 Requirement is satisfied here: decrementSI_DiagnoseActiveTimer ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/UDS_Services_Chorus/DiagnosticTimers/c/src/DiagnosticTimers.c line 737 Requirement is satisfied here: update_SI_DiagnoseActive_Signal ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/UDS_Services_Chorus/DiagnosticTimers/c/src/DiagnosticTimers.c line 781 Requirement is satisfied here: SuspendAllInterrupts ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/UDS_Services_Chorus/DiagnosticTimers/c/src/DiagnosticTimers.c line 881 Requirement is satisfied here: DiagnosticTimersSetDefaultSessionState ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/UDS_Services_Chorus/DiagnosticTimers/c/src/DiagnosticTimers.c line 1039
Requirement is not verified IF Chorus has received the diagnostic message, THEN Chorus shall reset the timer for si_Diagnose_Aktiv to the initial value = 4 seconds and start the timer AND Chorus shall set the signal Systeminfo_01.SI_Diagnose_Aktiv = 1. ID: SWR_ICAS1_Diag_911 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_Diag_912
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: SuspendAllInterrupts ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/UDS_Services_Chorus/DiagnosticTimers/c/src/DiagnosticTimers.c line 882
Requirement is not verified IF The timer for si_Diagnose_Aktiv expired, THEN Chorus shall set the signal Systeminfo_01.SI_Diagnose_Aktiv = 0.
ID: SWR_ICAS1_Diag_912 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM
